Need to bleed out brake fluid Mr Pete
Also please make sure to bed in your rotors and pads once the install is done
Follow the manufacturer recommended bedding in cycle
Refers to repeated heating and cooling of the rotors and pads by applying the brakes and letting them cool down
It's done to make sure there is even wear throughout the life of the pads and the rotors and also extract the most performance from your brake setup
Must be done everytime you change your pads  and especially need to do if you change your rotors
Brembo will have a guide along with your brakes on what's the exact process and cycle to follow for your model of rotors and brakes
